title: John Vervaeke and I ask Who's Afraid of Inevitable Religio?
description:
I wanted to get another conversation in with John before the holiday season and his new teaching semester. We talked about how Jordan Peterson opened up a space for these conversations where we address the meaning crisis. We talked about meetups and how churches can make space for helpful conversations for dialogos and processing. We talked some church and Western history. We played with a lot of Latin words to hopefully find ways to talk about some things without triggering less productive long-standing debates. 

John Vervaeke's Channel https://www.youtube.com/user/johnvervaeke
Awakening from the Meaning Crisis https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLND1JCRq8Vuh3f0P5qjrSdb5eC1ZfZwWJ

Click here to meetup with other channel viewers for conversation https://discord.gg/WkkHMTt The link will prompt you to download the software for this free group messaging service. This link updates every 100 users so look for the most recent videos if this link doesn't work.



If you want to schedule a one-on-one conversation check here. https://paulvanderklay.me/2019/08/06/converzations-with-pvk/
